subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|一生涯|いっしょうがい}}: lifetime
* {{ja-r|境涯|きょうがい}}: circumstances; one's situation in life
* {{ja-r|公生涯|こうしょうがい}}: public life
* {{ja-r|際涯|さいがい}}: limits; boundary; end
* {{ja-r|水涯|すいがい}}: water's edge
* {{ja-r|全生涯|ぜんしょうがい}}: one's whole life
* {{ja-r|天涯|てんがい}}: horizon; distant land; skyline; heavenly shores; remote region
* {{ja-r|生涯%学習|しょうがい%がくしゅう}}: lifelong learning
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
By extension from verb {{m|ja|果てる|tr=hateru||to be at an end, to finish, to be done}}.

The ''hate'' reading for {{lang|ja|涯}} is rare, and is not listed in all dictionaries.

subSections.title: Noun
